title: Customize your drink
description: Make your drink just right with an extra espresso shot, dairy substitute or a dash of your favorite syrup.

title: Brewed hot or iced coffee or tea, bakery item, or packaged snack
description: Treat yourself to a hot brewed coffee or tea, a pastry, or a packaged snack.

title: Handcrafted drink, hot breakfast, or parfait
description: Turn your Stars into a handcrafted beverage, a hot breakfast sandwich, or a delicious parfait.

title: Packaged coffee or a single merchandise item
description: Take home a signature cup, a bag of coffee, or your choice of select coffee accessories.

title: Select merchandise
description: Redeem your stars for select Starbucks merchandise like a signature tumbler or coffee press.
